title: Bug 17423: Revert appears twice in the popup menu.
description: There are two 'Revert' options in the menu.
OB: The 'Revert' option is duplicated in the popup menu.
EB: The 'Revert' option should appear only once in the popup menu.
SR: Investigate and resolve the issue causing the duplication of the 'Revert' option in the popup menu. Ensure that only one 'Revert' option is displayed.
